target.name: help
target.description: Displays the usage

echo.message: compiletest --> compiles the tests source code
squiggle --> runs Squiggle the SVG browser
svgbrowser --> runs Squiggle the SVG browser
ttf2svg --> converts selected glyphs from a True Type
Font file to the SVG Font format
regard --> runs the regard regression utility
regard.manual --> runs regard tests that require user
runtestsuite --> runs a TestSuite, given an XML test suite
runtest --> runs a test whose class name is given at the command line
showpainter --> runs a Painter test instance to check its rendering.
sitedoc --> generates the site documentation without
html --> generates the site documentation in
htmldoc --> generates the site documentation in
printerdoc --> generates the printable documentation in
splash --> Updates documentation and browser splash screens
jarDepend --> Updates jar files dependency image
all-jar --> Creates a combined JAR file of the Batik
See the comments in the build.xml file for more details.
